website_summaries.verdict: A classic black ankle boot for a good price without giving up the style factor. One of the most affordable and stylish Nine West boots on the market.
pros: An ankle boot that doesn’t cut into the ankle at all
The 3-inch heel makes it comfortable to walk in for long periods of time without hurting feet
cons: The shoe feels quite tight if you order it true to size
Order half a size up instead

customer_reviews.title: Great price and look good
customer_reviews.text: Great price and look good. Not very durable if do something active in them. my wife drove a go-cart and destroyed them in one session. I think this is to be expected but they were trashed. Wear them as intended and I think they will be fine. my wife also has had broken both ankles and these provide her pain free walking unlike other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Houston Dad

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite pair. These are great
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite pair. These are great. I ordered a half size up (7.5 ordered 8) as I always do for pointy shoes and they fit great. Classic look, will never go out of style and can be worn with everything. Great purchase, nice price. The heel height is perfect for all day in the office. They add additional dressy look to any outfit. They can feel a little wobbly at first because of the skinny heel, if you are not used to that kind of heel. I am looking forward to wearing these a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Super Sexy!
customer_reviews.text: They are the perfect height for a 51 year old...LOL. But still sexy! I absolutely love them, the way they hung the ankle. The height of the ankle shaft works with both jeans and skinny pants/leggings. You can wear jeans over them and stretch skinny inside, they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Clearly worn beforehand
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with these boots. They were clearly worn beforehand and in unacceptable condition when they arrive. Yes these boots are comfortable to wear which is why they get one star. But regardless, still extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Rosita

customer_reviews.title: The style is as expected (true to picture) but the ...
customer_reviews.text: The style is as expected (true to picture) but the right shoe is much tighter than other Nine west shoes that I have. The pair that I received was probably defective. I returned them for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: I am glad, I did
customer_reviews.text: Very gorgeous boots . Got burgundy suede bag by Nine West to make it a set . I am glad, I did
customer_reviews.author: Olga S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful booties
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the style; already have them in Black!
customer_reviews.author: Yiota

customer_reviews.title: They're perfect! It's so hard to find boots like these ...
customer_reviews.text: They're perfect! It's so hard to find boots like these in stores without being so expensive, I definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love, its almost time to pull them out again... #fall
customer_reviews.author: Frecklejane

customer_reviews.title: Cute booties, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Cute booties, great price! I bought them .5 size bigger to be able to wear a heavier sock, but they fit pretty good with hosiery as well. I was surprised to see how high the heel was, but still very comfortable. Looking forward to wearing them through Spring.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the most comfortable heals I've worn in a long time. They felt great and looked even better.
customer_reviews.author: Cmarsh

customer_reviews.title: suprisingly comfortable yet fashionable
customer_reviews.text: comfortable and fashionable. I walk alot at work and my feet were just fine in these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Loving the Boot.
customer_reviews.text: Loving the boot. Beautiful color and fit. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nine West Women's Paganeli Suede Boot
product_meta.description:
Nine west offers a quick edit of the runways -- pinpointing the must have looks of the season, and translating what is fun, hip, and of the moment. it is trend-right footwear that you will reach for in your closet again and again. nine west is sure to be your trusted resource for everyday chic style.

It is trend-right footwear that you will reach for in your closet again and again. Nine West is sure to be your trusted resource for everyday chic style.
